NIKA LOBANOVA

personal stylist

Hi! My name is Nika Lobanova, and I am a stylist.

And image maker, personal shopper, and best friend of a basic wardrobe, trending tendencies, and smart approach to wardrobe analysis as well.

Nice to meet you! Let's stay in my cozy blog and get to know each other better.

Do I need a stylist?

Bend your fingers and count the answers:

  • I have a wardrobe full of clothes, but nothing to wear.For some reason, clothes don't want to go together. There's no chance of mixing and matching them into amazing and stylish capsules.
  • I want something, but I don't know what.I love shopping malls, but I do not like shopping. Furthermore, I just don't know what clothes to buy, how many, and where I can wear them later.
  • Nothing ever suits me.Yes, a lot of people around are trying to help, but they don't get me right. A friend offers me a red dress, but I don't like red. Mom tells me to be more feminine, but I have a different view of femininity.
  • I buy everything in a store.It seems to me that I can get on the right track. The term “impulsive buying” was coined specifically to describe my attitude toward shopping. My wardrobe is overflowing, but I repeat the same outfits over and over again.
  • I'm scared to buy new clothes.I don't like being disappointed by my decisions, but this emotion haunts me constantly during shopping.

Counting the results!

If there's at least one bent finger, you should get a consultation. If there's more than one, the next block is especially for you.

And if there are none — my colleague, welcome to my shopping world!

Based on this principle, stylists do work with stars and celebrities.

Wardrobe Capsule virtual

Every woman requires basic clothes, so she can mix and match them with the rest of her wardrobe.

Wardrobe overhaul virtual/in-store

price: 180 USD

It's our first step towards finding your style and building your perfect wardrobe.

First, I ask you to fill in a small questionnaire. It helps me to understand your life. After all, every person is unique. And you. You're very special, I'm telling you for sure.

Armed with your questionnaire and my knowledge, and experience accumulated over the years, I'll help you find your style.

In the meeting, I evaluate what you already have in your wardrobe. We analyze your body type together. And when you go to the store next time, you'll have no hesitation over cuts and styles you should pay attention to.

I show you how to style what you already have in your wardrobe, create new outfits with all your clothes, and update them to look brand new.

Then I prepare a list of what can be added to your wardrobe during your next shopping. Our shopping list will consist entirely of things that match everything in your wardrobe.
